resources.string: 331/C KIADB Industrial area Near Infosys Gate number 2 Hebbal Mysore 570018
I accept al the terms & conditions of Ezeerentals.

Ezeerentals - A hassel free, simple bike rental company of Royal City, Mysore. We have a wide range of scooters and bikes available to rent and move on. We are authorized by RTO and we are the first company in Mysore to hold the rental boards on bike. Ezeerentals provides more option for visiotrs of Mysore to explore in and around places like

Renting a Motorcycle (Bike and Scooter) in Mysore has always been a cumbersome process. We at EEZEE Rentals make sure that renting your favorite Bike or Scooter is as EEZEE as it gets.We specialize in Providing Bike and Scooter on Rent in Mysore.

The youngest and the most enthusiastic member of our team. He is always up for challenges and makes sure he accomplishes them in style. A proud owner of Royal Enfield and Kawasaki, can be spotted in and around Mysore (Hint: A loud Akrapovic exhaust on his Z800).

An Electronics engineer and a freelance journalist, his affection towards motorcycles is quite immense. He has been on biking expeditions all over India and also does solo bike trips to find his \â€˜Inner Peace\' (Just an excuse for not being there at the office). He seldom goes anywhere without his trusted Pulsar.

We call him Chikki Mikki\' a slang for small mechanic. He is our go t o guy when it comes to fixing bikes, from Ducati\'s to Royal Enfield\'s, he knows them all like back of his hand. His passion for motorcycles started at a very young age (some say he rode bikes as a toddler, which is yet to be verified). A collector of vintage Motorcycles and Modern beauties.
